name: Gary is Growing Up!
description:
Gary is just a short child that desires to be taller, and his wishes become true!

But, is that a good thing...?

Controls
  • A, D, Left or Right Arrows: Move around
  • SPACE: Jump
Credits
  • Game by Oscar Moreno (Asdonaur)
  • All visual assets by Kenney:
    • Pixel Platformer
    • Pixel Platformer Blocks
    • Kenney Fonts
    • Creature Mixer
  • All audio assets by Kenney:
    • Impact Sounds
    • Music Jingles
    • Digital Audio
    • Sci-fi Sounds
    • UI Audio
  • Music: "Exploration", from Adventure Music Collection Pack 1
